dialog-delmar-blab.name: %Delmar%
messages:
...I tied an onion to my belt, which was
the style at the time.

Now, to take the ferry cost a nickle, and
in those days, nickles had pictures of
bumblebees on 'em.

"Gimme five bees for a quarter," you'd
say. Now where were we?

Oh, yeah. The important thing was that I
had an onion on my belt, which was the
style of the time.

They didn't have any white onions, because
of the war. The only thing you could get
was those big yellow ones....

dialog-delmar-catchup.name: %Delmar%
messages: Huh? What's goin' on? What'd I miss?

dialog-bea-start1.name: %Beatrice%
messages:
Forty years ago, things were sure
different.

I was a lot younger then, and my husband,
%Delmar%....

dialog-bea-start2.name: %Beatrice%
messages:
My husband was a real man! Not a farm
animal!

dialog-bea-start3.name: %Beatrice%
messages:
That ghastly hacker ruffian hacked him
into a sheep on a whim!

%Delmar% didn't even do anything
to him!

...Other than insult his character, and
that of his mother.
...And eat his lunch.
...And cut his brake line.

The point is, child, that %Delmar%'s
been stuck as a sheep ever since!
But you, now that you have Ring Zero....

You can make things right again, can't
you?
I miss my %Delmar%!

dialog-bea-start3.name: %PLAYER%
messages:
Make things right? Well, I can change
what he looks like, anyway.

dialog-bea-start3.name: %Beatrice%
messages: That works for me!

dialog-bea-start-s.name: %Beatrice%
messages:
Oh, %Delmar%... we'll fix you up
real soon!

dialog-bea-mandud1.name: %Beatrice%
messages: Oh, %Delmar%! You're... oh....

dialog-bea-mandud2.name: %Beatrice%
messages:
Oh, goodness. Well, this isn't my
%Delmar%, but I suppose it's nice
he's not a sheep anymore, at least.

He's been a sheep for so long... well, I
suppose it's been forty years.

dialog-bea-mandud-s.name: %Beatrice%
messages:
Oh, %Delmar%! We'll make you your
normal self soon!

dialog-bea-happy.name: %Beatrice%
messages:
Oh, %Delmar%, it's you!
You're a man again! At last!

dialog-bea-happy.name: %Delmar%
messages:
Whazzat, %Beatrice%? Something seems
different.

dialog-bea-happy.name: %Beatrice%
messages:
Oh, it's my %Delmar%! Thank you,
%PLAYER%!

dialog-bea-trick.name: %Beatrice%
messages:
Oh! That's a nasty trick,
%PLAYER%!
How could you?

Although... I sort of get the feeling
he'll be back to normal in a few minutes.

dialog-bea-confused.name: %Beatrice%
messages: Oh, %Delmar%, you're... uh....

dialog-bea-end-s.name: %Beatrice%
messages: Thank you, %PLAYER%!

dialog-bea-regret1.name: %Beatrice%
messages:
You know, I appreciate what you did,
%PLAYER%. I really do.

dialog-bea-regret3.name: %Beatrice%
messages: But now I find myself longing for quiet.

It was so peaceful, before. Me and
%Delmar% used to get along so well.

And it's so difficult to fall asleep
recently.
I hate to ask it, child, but....

I can't hear myself think! Please change
him back!

dialog-bea-regret-s.name: %Beatrice%
messages:
I'm sure he won't mind being a sheep
again. In fact, I'm not sure he'll notice.

But I sure will! I won't have peace
otherwise!

dialog-bea-relief.name: %Beatrice%
messages: Thank you, child!

...And, erm, we need not mention this to
anyone! You understand?

dialog-bea-relief-s.name: %Beatrice%
messages: Peace at last!

dialog-bea-coincidence.name: %Beatrice%
messages:
Oh! And I was just thinking how I wanted
him to become a sheep again!
So gentle... and so quiet!
Thank you, %PLAYER%!

dialog-bea-deja.name: %Beatrice%
messages:
I suddenly have the strangest feeling of
deja vu.

dialog-debug-sequel.name: %SELF%
messages: Sequal branch activated.
